titleInfo.title: May be 3041 East Lake Shore Drive, listed as ""under construction"" in the 1947 city directory

mods.note: Looking north, frame includes East Lake Shore from intersection with Christian Street to just past Bengal Lane. Morning Glory Avenue is seen in this frame.
East Lake Shore Drive between Christian and Ferndale
